tool_description: Evaluates supplier risk across financial stability, operational capacity, geographic factors, and compliance status to support vendor selection and monitoring.

supplier_id.description: Unique identifier for the supplier to assess

financial_data.description: Array of financial metrics and indicators

geographic_location.description: Primary business location for geographic risk assessment

business_size.description: Business size category: small, medium, large, enterprise

industry_sector.description: Primary industry sector of the supplier

years_in_business.description: Number of years the supplier has been in business

error_messages: Invalid supplier_id: No supplier found with the provided supplier_id
Invalid business size: Business size must be one of [small, medium, large, enterprise]
Negative years: Years in business cannot be negative
Insufficient data: Not enough information available for comprehensive risk assessment
Invalid geographic location: Unable to assess geographic risk for the provided location
usage: Provide supplier_id as minimum requirement. Include additional parameters like financial_data, geographic_location, business_size for more comprehensive risk assessment. The tool will evaluate multiple risk dimensions.

overall_risk_score.description: Overall risk score from 0-100 (higher means more risky)

risk_category.description: Risk categorization: low, medium, high, critical

risk_factors.description: Array of identified risk factors and concerns

mitigation_recommendations.description: Array of recommended risk mitigation strategies
